Cherry River.name: Cherry River
Cherry River.description: A needle made out from a red gem taken from Cherry River, a place known for gemstones.

Kranos.name: Kranos
Kranos.description: A red needle with a white spiral hilt  covered by several sealing stones that display the story of Quadrado and the journey of the Great Warriors.

Black March.name: Black March
Black March.description: A jet black needle that is extremely thin with a slightly thicker handle.

Lecalicus.name: Lecalicus
Lecalicus.description: A needle received for passing the Head Pupil's test in The Workshop.

Green April.name: Green April
Green April.description: A green hook that is capable of elongating.
